text:
@Yamiche #Trump claiming #America can fight thru this without a #vaccine is like telling soldiers to charge the enemy without a weapon. 
If you #sacrifice enough people, you may get thru it, but was it worth it?  And at this point, #necessary?  
#NeverALeader 
#CoronavirusPandemic
